title: RA Sushi offers shareable cocktails for groups
statement: RA Sushi provides cocktails designed for two or more people, including Blue Samurai, Strawberry Seduction Margarita, and Tipsy Dragon.

citations.quote: BLUE SAMURAI... (for two or more)... STRAWBERRY SEDUCTION MARGARITA... (for two or more)... TIPSY DRAGON... (for two or more)
